metadata.title: CVE-2016-5734 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.16, 4.4.x before 4.4.15.7, and 4.6.x before4.6.3 does not properly choose delimiters to prevent use of thepreg_replace e (aka eval) modifier, which might allow remote attackers toexecute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted string, as demonstrated by thetable search-and-replace implementation.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
